thread.title: Why was Tom Cruise rooting against the Florida Gators?
thread.title_full: Why was Tom Cruise rooting against the Florida Gators? | www.daytondailynews.com

author: daytondailynews
title: Why was Tom Cruise rooting against the Florida Gators?
text:
There was some star power on and off the field at the Florida Gators-LSU Tigers game in Baton Rouge Saturday.
Tom Cruise showed up in the press box and on the sidelines because he is apparently shooting a movie in the New Orleans area, according to Nola.com .
>> Read more trending stories
Tom Cruise is here at #LSU taking in the game. pic.twitter.com/PZA0pk0jON
— Lyons Yellin WWL-TV (@LyonsYellin) October 18, 2015 The appearance turned into a treat for some fans who got to meet the celebrity.
Tigers win & Tom Cruise got to meet Max! Great night to be a Tiger. #LSU pic.twitter.com/K4Tv71eIyc
— Michael Bonnette (@LSUBonnette) October 18, 2015 Unfortunately, for Gators fans, he appears to be rooting for LSU, which eventually won the game 35-28.
